column4: Is the package linux-source-2.6.16 what i need if i want the source for linux-image-2.6.16-23-686?
to get the source use apt-get source linux-image-2.xxxx
could you provide me the full command i'm a little slow
E: You must put some 'source' URIs in your sources.list
so do it :) look in you /etc/apt/sources.list there are most likely some commented lines starting with deb-src uncomment them and do a apt-get update
E: Unable to find a source package for linux-image-2.6.16-23-686
all i want to do is build ndiswrappers from source
now should i un-tarball the linux-source which is in /usr/src?
i just need to make that one symlink
but see VERSION in the second argument i just wrote it says 2.6.16-23 instead of 2.6.15
follow the wikilink i told you
